sentences.sContent: So the American company fired the rower.
sentences.sContent_eng: So the American company fired the rower.
sentences.sCn: 因此，美国公司解雇了划桨员。

sentences.sContent: Now they had one senior manager, six management consultants and one rower.
sentences.sContent_eng: Now they had one senior manager, six management consultants and one rower.
sentences.sCn: 这次他们有一个高级舵手、六个舵手顾问、一个划桨员。

sentences.sContent: Just last year, British ocean rower Roz Savage became the first woman to cross the Pacific Ocean alone, in a rowboat.
sentences.sContent_eng: Just last year, British ocean rower Roz Savage became the first woman to cross the Pacific Ocean alone, in a rowboat.
sentences.sCn: 就在去年，英国海洋桨手罗兹萨维奇成为了独自划船跨越太平洋的第一名女性。
